review: Love, love, love. Much better than any other device we had for internet TV. We subscribe to Amazon Prime so don't know if this would be as useful without it. The voice search is amazing and correct every time (even with our heavy southern accents). Programs and apps load quickly and, based on our wifi connection, it is seamless viewing. Everything was extremely easy to setup and had a nice info video when you first turn it on.  Would recommend to anyone!

author: Serious Sirius listener

review: We just "cut the Dishnetwork cable" and installed Fire TV and we couldn't be happier! Especially the voice search, just like Gary Busey demonstrates, simply speak into the handheld remote and BOOM it's all there! We're still able to get some of the FX Series for a small fee of $3.99 per episode. When you start doing the math on all the programs watched on Fire TV and add all the movies provided by we are still way below Dishnetwork's monthly billing charge (basic plan is all we had, no movie channels) PLUS all the available apps. We also installed HD antennas to capture local TV affiliates that Fire TV doesn't provide. It's a win win for us!!! I highly recommend it!!!!
author: Kent Clower

review: Love the Amazon Fire.  I have been an Amazon Prime member for several years and this gives me access to my movies and songs.  I didn't even know that we could watch things like Dave Chappelle Show and the Sorprano's as part of Amazon Prime.  It also allows me to play family games like LIFE and Lego Star Wars.  We especially like Fibbage for adult family friends.  I have the console and the USB Amazon Fire stick.  I take the Amazon Fire stick on the road.Voice search on the remote has been great.  Sometimes we sit around and remember old movies and search them up.  Playing youtube from my phone to the TV has also been a hit.

review: This is an outstanding streaming device. I use it mostly for Amazon instant video, Netflix , and I use the plex app to access content on my home server. Obviously your internet service will play a big part, with a good broadband connection this device produces an excellent picture and sound from whatever services you subscribe too. In my opinion it is the best of the streaming boxes on the market. If you are looking for a streaming device give this one a shot I don't think you will be disappointed.
